scripts.tsc: tsc || echo TSC compilation has errors.
scripts.setup-pm2: npm install -g pm2 && pm2 install pm2-logrotate
scripts.start:staging: npm run build && npm run setup-pm2 && pm2 delete all; NODE_ENV=staging pm2 start dist/index.js --node-args='--max-old-space-size=1768' --log-date-format 'DD-MM HH:mm:ss.SSS' --log ./output.log && tail -f /dev/null
scripts.start:production: npm run build && npm run setup-pm2 && sudo cp -rf src/views dist/src/; NODE_ENV=production pm2 start dist/index.js --name 'ACB-EVENT' --node-args='--max-old-space-size=1768' --log-date-format 'DD-MM HH:mm:ss.SSS' --log ./output.log && tail -f /dev/null
scripts.start:production1: sudo rm -rf dist1 && npm run build && sudo mv dist dist1 && sudo cp -rf src/views dist1/src/ && sudo cp src/serviceAccountKey.json dist1/src/ && sudo cp src/swagger.json dist1/src/;
scripts.start:production2: sudo rm -rf dist2 && npm run build && sudo mv dist dist2 && sudo cp -rf src/views dist2/src/ && sudo cp src/serviceAccountKey.json dist2/src/ && sudo cp src/swagger.json dist2/src/;
scripts.start:all: npm run start:production1 && npm run start:production2 && pm2 start pm2.json
